attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The city of Sunderland is in need of an ice rink.After closing our ice rink in 2000 because it was leaking through to the shopping center it was never fixed and still stands today in Crowtree leisure center with an astro turf over the top.The children of Sunderland are missing out on this ever popular hobby which would be in great demand today.
